ygData.subject: Re: Oasis Warning
ygData.msgSnippet: Awsome they have finnaly come up with a idea to stop camping.....Also put caps on servers..?!?!?!?! Are you crazy almost all teh servers ahve 1600 some almsot
ygData.messageBody:
Awsome they have finnaly come up with a idea to stop
camping.....Also put caps on servers..?!?!?!?! Are you crazy almost all teh
servers ahve 1600 some almsot 2000 capping tehm would jsut be ridiculous and
very dumb on Verants part. What I think they should do with stuff like
JBoots is put it on a NPC and have him Randomly spawn somewhere in that zone
and not in the same place.
-----Original Message-----
From: Azor <jmaynus@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 11:53 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Oasis Warning


>From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
>
>I read on another post that with the new patch they did a few changes with
>the Oasis.
>This is what the post said
>
>"Ok new news on this one... if anyone has hunted there before you know the
>typical problems of avoiding sand giant, spectres, and sometimes
Tarantualla
>whatever his name is. Well they are chicken feed.
>
>As of patch we now have deepwater goblins. Shamans over 35+ with the wolf
>pets running around the beach of Oasis. Are they aggressive? YES Are they
>strong? HELL YES
>
>Last night I witnessed one clean the beach between 2nd and 1st rock, then
>kill a SAND GIANT and go back to the water for a swim. Apparently the Gods
>have decided they did not appreciate our camping along the beach. Party
time
>is over.
>
>They also added cistern asps. No biggie probably 14th level or so."
>
>So if this is 100% true and you're around Lvl 35 or lower you might wanna
be
>extra careful there.
>
>**************************
>Azor
>Lvl 18 Human Cleric of The Rathe
>**************************
>
